bib.title: Readitopics: Make your topic models readable via labeling and browsing
bib.citation: IJCAI: International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence, 2018
bib.author: Julien Velcin and Antoine Gourru and Erwan Giry-Fouquet and Christophe Gravier and Mathieu Roche and Pascal Poncelet
bib.conference: IJCAI: International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence
bib.abstract: Readitopics provides a new tool for browsing a textual corpus that showcases several recent work for labeling topic models and estimating topic coherence. We will demonstrate the potential of these techniques to get a deeper understanding of the topics that structure different kinds of datasets. This tool is provided as a Web demo but it can be easily installed to experiment with your own dataset. It can be further extended to deal with more advanced topic modeling techniques.
